name: Summer in Surya
description:
The city of Surya is experiencing a series of outages from an overloaded power grid in the middle of sweltering summer heat. Ginny the electrical engineer must travel across the city and install clean energy solutions to restore power to the metropolis. Help her choose which route to take that leaves the smallest carbon footprint while getting to work on time!

Post-game recap & research: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gsMDVmuHvb-fDQbrs-9bVCptBCr58fIP/view?usp=shari...

Submission for Climate Jam 2021

Designer: Annabell Liao, Art: Olly Skillman-Wilson & Julia Lee, Research: Ekaterina Bogdanova & Sydney Kuhl, Music: Jake Krasniewicz, Sound: Victor Ruiz, Programming: Victor Ngo & Juan Aguilera, Additional Creatives: James Powell & Ekaterina Bogdanova
